articles.author: Jennifer Rigby
articles.title: Dengue will 'take off' in southern Europe, US, Africa this decade, WHO scientist says - Reuters
articles.description: Dengue fever will become a major threat in the southern United States, southern Europe and new parts of Africa this decade, the WHO's chief scientist said, as warmer temperatures create the conditions for the mosquitoes carrying the infection to spread.
articles.content: LONDON, Oct 6 (Reuters) - Dengue fever will become a major threat in the southern United States, southern Europe and new parts of Africa this decade, the WHO's chief scientist said, as warmer tempera… [+4002 chars]
